testcase.name: bsafe_module_starts

error.message: Error in `app_initialize(self, private, app_dir = app_dir, ..., load_timeout = load_timeout, ('test-bsafe_app.R:4:5')

testcase.error:
Error in `app_initialize(self, private, app_dir = app_dir, ..., load_timeout = load_timeout, timeout = timeout, wait = wait, expect_values_screenshot_args = expect_values_screenshot_args, screenshot_args = screenshot_args, check_names = check_names, name = name, variant = variant, view = view, height = height, width = width, seed = seed, clean_logs = clean_logs, shiny_args = shiny_args, render_args = render_args, options = options)`: code: -32602 message: Target position can only be set for new windows
i You can inspect the failed AppDriver object via `rlang::last_error()$app` i AppDriver logs: {shinytest2} R info 13:03:29.85 Start AppDriver initialization {shinytest2} R info 13:03:29.88 Starting Shiny app {shinytest2} R info 13:03:30.72 Creating new ChromoteSession {shinytest2} R info 13:03:30.74 Error while initializing AppDriver: code: -32602 message: Target position can only be set for new windows {shiny} R stderr ----------- Loading required package: shiny {shiny} R stderr ----------- Running application in test mode. {shiny} R stderr ----------- {shiny} R stderr ----------- Listening on http://127.0.0.1:3570
Caused by error in `callback()`: ! code: -32602 message: Target position can only be set for new windows Backtrace: x 1. +-shinytest2::AppDriver$new(teal.modules.bsafe:::mock_bsafe()) at test-bsafe_app.R:4:5 2. | \-shinytest2 (local) initialize(...) 3. | \-shinytest2:::app_initialize(...) 4. | +-base::withCallingHandlers(...) 5. | \-shinytest2:::app_initialize_(self, private, ..., view = view) 6. | \-chromote::default_chromote_object()$new_session() 7. | \-chromote:::create_session(...) 8. | \-ChromoteSession$new(...) 9. | \-chromote (local) initialize(...) 10. | \-self$wait_for(p) 11. | \-self$parent$wait_for(p) 12. | \-chromote:::synchronize(p, loop = private$child_loop) 13. | +-promises::with_promise_domain(...) 14. | | \-domain$wrapSync(expr) 15. | | \-base::force(expr) 16. | +-base::tryCatch(...) 17. | | \-base (local) tryCatchList(expr, classes, parentenv, handlers) 18. | | \-base (local) tryCatchOne(expr, names, parentenv, handlers[[1L]]) 19. | | \-base (local) doTryCatch(return(expr), name, parentenv, handler) 20. | \-base::stop(value) 21. \-shinytest2 (local) `<fn>`(`<smplErrr>`) 22. \-shinytest2:::app_abort(...) 23. \-rlang::abort(..., app = self, call = call)
